item.title: FDA OKs Skytrofa for Growth Hormone Deficiency in Adults
item.description: The once-weekly injection, already approved in pediatric patients with GHD, offers convenience over daily injections. Medscape Medical News

item.title: EMA Reverses Previous Refusal of Kisunla for Alzheimer's
item.description: Results from the phase 3 TRAILBLAZER-ALZ 2 trial support the updated positive opinion for donanemab, the active substance of Kisunla. Medscape Medical...

item.title: Managing CKD-Associated Pruritus

item.title: FDA Seeks Schedule I Status for ‘Legal Morphine’
